name: cookie-jar-protocol
description: A decentralized funding protocol with smart contract pools and frontend interface
author: Greenpill Dev Guild

scripts.build: pnpm run build:contracts && pnpm run copy:deployment && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.test: pnpm run test:contracts && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:contracts && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:contracts && pnpm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: pnpm --filter cookie-jar-v3 run build && rm -rf frontend/build frontend/.next
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployLocal.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast --sender 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 && cd .. && pnpm copy:deployment
